\chapter{Indices and tables}
\label{\detokenize{contents:indices-and-tables}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\DUrole{xref,std,std-ref}{genindex}

\item {} 
\DUrole{xref,std,std-ref}{modindex}

\item {} 
\DUrole{xref,std,std-ref}{search}

\end{itemize}
